text: Paul Breuer (born 25 June 1950) is a German politician. He represents the CDU. Breuer served as a member of the Bundestag from the state of North Rhine- Westphalia from 1980 to 2003. == Life == In 1980 he was elected to the German Bundestag via the state list of the CDU North Rhine-Westphalia. In the elections from 1983 to 1994 he won the constituency of Siegen-Wittgenstein directly. In 1998 and 2002 he again entered the Bundestag via the state list. Breuer was spokesman for defense policy of the CDU/CSU faction from 1992 to 2003.
